issue_title: [Feature] 添加 Todo 标签/分类字段支持

implementation_summary.description: Add tags field support to Todo model and CLI for categorization

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Todo supports optional tags field (default empty tuple)
acceptance_criteria.evidence: Added tags: tuple[str, ...] = () field to Todo dataclass

acceptance_criteria.criterion: from_dict accepts list or tuple format tags
acceptance_criteria.evidence: from_dict parses tags from list/tuple and converts to tuple
Added --tag argument to list command, filter by tag membership

risks_and_limitations: Tags are stored as strings, no validation of tag format
No support for adding tags when creating todos via CLI add command
